note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: A simple social site, just learning the basics...
name: Osocial
body:
# Welcome to oSocial.
This is a simple social site with some basic features like users marking each other as friends.
This was strictly created for educational reasons, for learning the basics.

## The Basics
* multilingual
* form generation/validation engine
* PDO database
